default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Are you trying to take me home? Hehehe... if you treat me as a pet, it won't end well...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Hmm... this reminds me of the ouroboros.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I will... wrap around you tightly...

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Hope you have fun...

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: The hero pierced the snake's cranium with his sword, beheading the monstrous serpent. You know where the cranium is? You just touched it.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I've locked onto my target prey, hiss...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Thank you for making me feel that I am still alive.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Haha... pain is a reassuring sensation.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: This ends here. You will thank me later.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Do I feel... happy?

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I'm neither human nor monster, hmm... I think I might be a venomous snake?

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Will I get poisoned if I bite my own tongue...? You're so funny. It's as if snake venom got into your head.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Everyone has the right to laugh. Whoever takes it away will go to hell.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I can understand that some people don't like snakes, so you can also understand that I don't like some people, right?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Misery is the culprit that destroys laughter, but also heralds the birth of a new world. What do you think?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I love the way you smile, and it's even better if it's because of me.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Can you give me a hug? Your temperature reminds me of spring, the time of awakening, the season of rebirth... I can hear our hearts beating together.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Ah, a rare guest! You're here to see me again?

default.title: Idle
default.text: It's so quiet... it's as if the end of the world is nigh. Looks like I'll be able to get a good night's sleep.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hmm... seems like you want me to take a bite of you?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: If this can cheer you up...

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Did you like this performance?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: To look for one leaf in an entire forest... to lock onto one monster in an entire herd... you really have a lot of energy.

awake_from_slumber.title: Level Up
awake_from_slumber.text: Mmm... Just a little bit longer...

awake_from_slumber.title: Obtain Attire
awake_from_slumber.text: I had a long dream, a dream of pursuing happiness, a dream of... rebirth.

awake_from_slumber.title: Greeting
awake_from_slumber.text: Oh... It's spring already? I'll get up then... Give me two more minutes...

awake_from_slumber.title: Ordinary Contact 1
awake_from_slumber.text: The sheets are so warm... Chief, if you can join me up here... I'll be very happy...

awake_from_slumber.title: Ordinary Contact 2
awake_from_slumber.text: I can't miss this festive holiday... But I need some more time to prepare...

awake_from_slumber.title: Ordinary Contact 3
awake_from_slumber.text: No one can take away my... my blankets... Take away my Chief... Hehe... Snore... Snore...

awake_from_slumber.title: Ordinary Contact 4
awake_from_slumber.text: Mmm... Time for spring cleaning? But my place is quite tidy already... Or do you want to help me?

awake_from_slumber.title: Idle
awake_from_slumber.text: Sigh... The fireworks outside... really disturb my dreams...

awake_from_slumber.title: Special Attention
awake_from_slumber.text: My gosh, I'm almost done dressing! If you keep rushing me... I'll bite you!

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Level Up
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Hmm... that's quite a nice potion~

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Obtain Attire
elixir_of_euphoria.text: So, my little apothecary has finally gained some fame that even the Chief of Minos came in person, just to seek a dose of happiness.

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Greeting
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Oh my, you're here again? Chief~ If you really like my potions that much, why don't you just move in and... stay here for good?

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Ordinary Contact 1
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Your dark circles look even worse! You should try this "Slack-off Potion"? It can turn you into a cute rubber ducky or a little fuzzy plush in just a sec... What! Why not? This is a perfect chance for you to unwind and I get to play... take care of you!

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Ordinary Contact 2
elixir_of_euphoria.text: In addition to magic potions, I also sell candies. They may taste like peach or tangerine... or, of course, mustard or dish soap. Interested in trying one, Chief? Embracing the unknown is also a kind of joy!

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Idle
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Agarwood, apricot, cornflower, bloodroot, cardamom... This much should be enough. Hmm... the color is no good, maybe some hawthorn and saffron will make it better.

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Annoyed
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Hehe, the owner of this apothecary is not for sale. Keep playing naughty, and you might lose your hand~

elixir_of_euphoria.title: Special Attention
elixir_of_euphoria.text: Ah yes, eyes on me. Your gaze is the very last ingredient to perfect this potion.
